thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: French and Benelux stocks-Factors to watch on March 26

author: Reuters Editorial
title: French and Benelux stocks-Factors to watch on March 26
text:
March 26 (Reuters) - Below are company-related news and stories from French and Benelux media which could have an impact on the regionâ€™s markets or individual stocks.
BOUYGUES Colas and Bouygues construction acquire Swiss energy firm Alpiq engineering services.
ALSTOM Alstom announced the signature of a business combination agreement with Siemens.
ELIS Elis closed the acquisition of BW Textilservice in Germany.
CGG CGG announced the appointment of Sophie Zurquiyah as Chief Executive Officer.
TIGENIX Tigenix and Takeda announced it received European approval for Alofisel.
